name: High Roller (Tuja)
description:
You are a High Roller, and an expert at rolling the dice. Perhaps too much! You were gambling at the Epic Casino, but now they wanna throw you out, defend yourself using dice!

Controlls:
WASD or arrows to move.
Click to throw a dice.
F1 to fullscreen.
F2 to set the window size to 700x500.
F3 to set the window size to 1400x1000.
F4 and F5 turns the sound effects up/down.
F6 and F7 turns the music up/down.

This is a GMTK game jam 2022 submission, made in C++ with SDL2, in just 50 hours.
